text: Ta qing ta de shuangqin zuo zai gaozuo shang, tamen wei ta er fufu koutou, ta shuo: Wo de fuqin a! Zhe jiushi wo yiqian de meng zhao de jieshi. Wo de zhu yi shi nage meng zhao bian cheng wei shishile. Ta que yi youdai wo, yinwei ta ba wo cong jianyu li shifang chulai, ta zai emo lijian wo he wo gegemen zhihou, ba nimen cong shamo lidai dao zheli lai. Wo de zhu, dui tasuo yiyu zhe que shi ci'ai de. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi zhi rui de.
